content.description: Slab up to the back of the roof, and press your body out with hands on the body of the roof, until you reach the lip.   let your feet go, and control your swing.   campus up to the next rail, heel hook right, and press out.
content.location: the middle portion of the boulder, where the lip extends out the least from the base... where the lower lip is...

content.description:
Awesome! 

  If you make the horrible hike up and cross off the two projects on either side of "Practice Swing" please let me know! 

  This boulder is a huge shelf jutting out of the hillside, with an inclined slab of stone leading up to it. the problem and projects on this boulder all consist of either jumping out to the lip (resulting in a massive swing) or pressing out from under the roof to reach the lip (resulting in a swing)... the landing is good, but spotters will be needed. and there is a close tree to be weary of...
